articles.description: Donte Wright scored 17 points, Patrell Rogers scored 16 and South Carolina State held on to beat North Carolina A&T 90-85 on Saturday.
articles.headline: South Carolina State fends off late North Carolina A&T rally

articles.description: Donta Hall had 17 points and 11 rebounds and Collin Sexton scored 16 points to lead Alabama to a 78-50 victory over No. 15 Tennessee on Saturday night.
articles.headline: Alabama races to 78-50 win over streaking No. 15 Tennessee

images.caption: On consecutive drives, Alabama's Donta Hall bails out teammates Collin Sexton and Dazon Ingram with offensive rebounds leading to points.
images.name: Hall's extra effort plays help extend Bama's lead

articles.description: Chris Clemons knocked down five 3-pointers and scored 25 points as Campbell took over sole possession of third place in the Big South Conference by cruising past Longwood, 88-54 on Saturday.
articles.headline: Campbell alone in 3rd in Big South, beats Longwood 88-54

articles.description: Donta Hall leads the Crimson Tide with 17 points and 11 rebounds while Collin Sexton adds 16 points in a 28-point rout of the No. 15 Volunteers.
articles.headline: Alabama crushes No. 15 Tennessee

images.caption: Donta Hall leads the Crimson Tide with 17 points and 11 rebounds while Collin Sexton adds 16 points in a 28-point rout of the No. 15 Volunteers.
images.name: Alabama crushes No. 15 Tennessee

articles.description: Desmond Ringer had 17 points and seven rebounds, Ross Cummings added 16 points with four 3-pointers and Mercer beat Chattanooga 84-75 on Saturday.
articles.headline: Mercer tops Chattanooga 84-75

articles.description: Jaren Lewis had 20 points and 17 rebounds on Saturday and Abilene Christian led by double digits for most of the second half in an 80-69 win over Incarnate Word.
articles.headline: Lewis leads Abilene Christian over Incarnate Word 80-69
